effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
1st turn: Prepare
2nd turn: Attack

1st turn: Prepare
2nd turn: Attack

Absorbs light in one turn,
then attacks next turn.

Absorbs light in one turn,
then attacks next turn.

A 2-turn move that
blasts the foe with
absorbed energy in
the 2nd turn.

light, then blasts a
bundled beam on the
second turn.

A two-turn attack. The user gathers

A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam on the
second turn.

１ターンめに　ひかりを　いっぱいに
あつめ　２ターンめに　ひかりの　たばを
はっしゃして　こうげきする。

1턴째에 빛을 가득 모아
2턴째에 빛의 다발을
발사하여 공격한다.

Absorbe la lumière au premier tour et envoie un
rayon puissant au tour suivant.

Absorbiert Licht in Runde 1.
In Runde 2 erfolgt der Angriff.

Primer turno: absorbe luz. Segundo turno: lanza
un potente rayo de energía.

Chi la usa assorbe luce al primo turno per
proiettare un raggio intenso al turno successivo.

A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam on the
next turn.

１ターン目に　光を　いっぱいに　集め
２ターン目に　光の　束を
発射して　攻撃する。
